manifesto.title: MANIFESTO
manifesto.p1: Our mission is to allow humans to organize common projects (physical or online) in a resilient, safe, and transparent way, using radically simple tools.
manifesto.p2: We believe the world needs powerful, open-source, and decentralized tools to empower humans in their common projects. The time has come to fight back against centralized platforms.
manifesto.p3: We, the Samoura√Ø Coop crew, commit ourselves to building sustainable tools that help people organize whatever they want, with their friends, families, and communities.
manifesto.p4: We believe that an event is something that can change life and society. As we are French, we want to remind everyone that the French Revolution started with a very small group of people, discussing, voting, and gradually creating an entire movement for freedom, equality, and fraternity.
manifesto.p5: Zenao is more than a simple event organization platform. It's designed to let you and your tribe decide together what the future of your community is.
manifesto.p6: Zenao is a machine for creating DAOs* in a zen spirit, powered by
manifesto.p7: In case of emergency, stay zen and organize.

whitepaper.title: WHITEPAPER
whitepaper.vision-p1: Abstract & context: In today's digital world, all of our social interactions are governed and administered by commercial companies that manage centralised platforms on which we are merely consumers.
whitepaper.vision-p2: Zenao aims to gradually build a social and technological experience based on a radically different architecture that is open, modular, interoperable, and transparent.
whitepaper.vision-p3: We believe that users should have
whitepaper.vision-p3-end: in their relationship with the social organisations they found or join, but also in their relationship with the tool itself.
whitepaper.vision-p4: As the Zenao platform and application, the user community will gradually build a layer of governance based on a
whitepaper.product-p1: Zenao is a platform centered around communities and designed to progressively evolve toward decentralized governance.
whitepaper.product-p2: Today, users can participate in, create, or manage a community and its associated events. Ultimately, each community will become autonomous and decentralized, define its own rules, and control its operations. An individual will simply be a member of a community, with a role assigned by that community.
whitepaper.product-p3: The Zenao application itself follows a path toward decentralization, allowing power users to influence the direction and future roadmap of the platform.
product-features-list: Creation and management of public or private communities & events
Distributed governance system based on roles
Social community & events (messages, images, videos, polls, etc.)
Social profiles enabling users to showcase portfolios
product-upcoming-list: Accept payments (paid events, community subscription thought Stripe payments)
Accept cryptocurrency payments (Bitcoin, EVM, Stablecoins, etc.)
Vaults allowing communities to co-manage crypto-funds
make transactions using a multisig & dao votes
DAO Templates for easy and safe organisations configurations
fitting with simple models (from entrepreneurship to DAOs)
Connect DAOKit based IAM w/ centralized tools
ordering centralized services as a DAO
allowing private but trustable accounts with zero-knowledge proofs
whitepaper.gov-actors-p1: Each actor in the system is represented as a DAO:
gov-actors-list: User: a DAO with a single member, corresponding to a user account on the platform
Event: a DAO with multiple members who can distribute roles (participant, gatekeeper, organizer, etc.)
Community: a DAO composed of many members and events, with roles such as administrator, moderator, member, etc.
Zenao: the platform itself will become a community of users able to coordinate, self-fund, and co-administer the product through DAO governance
whitepaper.gov-actors-example: DAOs operate through a role-based permission system, where each role depends on specific governance rules. For example: an event DAO can grant a gatekeeper role to a user to give him the ability to check in tickets at entrance.
whitepaper.gov-arch-p1: Zenao is designed to integrate with programmable blockchain infrastructures.
gov-arch-list: Compatible with any Turing-complete VM (EVM, WASM, etc.)
whitepaper.gov-arch-p2: Zenao integrates a future-proof DAO framework called Daokit, developed in-house and used to represent every entity (community, event, user) as an upgradable DAO.
whitepaper.gov-arch-p3: Each DAO implementation can be updated over time, allowing continuous evolution of governance mechanisms.
whitepaper.gov-arch-doc: üìñ Documentation about DAOKit by Samoura√Ø crew.
whitepaper.story-title: 4. User Story Example ‚Äî Hyper Hacktive Festival
whitepaper.story-p1: As a first experience, the Samoura√Ø Coop team ( builders behind
whitepaper.story-p1-end: ) decided to demonstrate the power of Zenao's vision with a concrete use case.
whitepaper.story-p2: Context: Hyper Hacktive Festival is a short film festival taking place in Paris, produced by the Samoura√Ø Coop crew with a strong ‚ÄúDAO Culture‚Äù approach. The concept is to build an engaged and passionate community around films and audiovisual creations in Paris‚Äîconnecting, encouraging, and supporting the next generation of young directors.
story-community-actions-list: A community meet-up before the event to connect with others
The main event in a cinema, screening 8 to 10 short films
Vote for films and directors they want the community to support
Serve as jury members for the next event's film selection
story-tools-list: Community page: gathering all community information
Events page: focusing on main event details
Polls and feeds for community discussion and media sharing
story-organizer-list: Set up community page and create events
Send newsletters and emails to community members
Administration / Treasury Manager / Community Manager / Technicians / Developers
Gatekeepers and security officers at the entrance (scanning tickets)
story-community-member-list: Stay informed about community news and initiatives via email
Connect and collaborate with other community members
Create a personal profile and portfolio
Gain roles based on responsibilities and trust
Vote on community governance, grant allocations, etc.
story-others-list: Use profile as a professional portfolio
Vote on community governance, grant allocations, etc.
whitepaper.roadmap-p1: At this stage of Zenao, we believe the only focus must remain to address users needs. 99% of the population are not interested about decentralization or distributed protocols values. People are just looking for efficient tools, products and simple apps to fit their needs.
whitepaper.roadmap-p2: We consider that Zenao is made for real-life needs and not ‚ÄúWeb3 speculation‚Äù narratives. The potential of the dApp is very large, both in term of ‚Äúmarket‚Äù, as a product, but also in term of adoption for decentralized protocols to be used by main stream people.
whitepaper.roadmap-p3: We want to spend upcoming phase to make the user experience perfectly fitting with non-tech people, in order to orchestrate an organic, in-real-life,and non-speculative user growth.
whitepaper.roadmap-p4: Once we‚Äôll reach an important monthly user base, we‚Äôll progressively present our decentralization roadmap and present it to our power-users as a proposal, fitting perfectly with the DAO culture we want to encourage, support and build with and for the Zenao community.
